[\[258b.1\]]bshad pa dang /_/'tsho ba dang ni 'chil mas kyang /_/bkru ba lus la gnas pas na/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis mi gtsang rig_/ces so/_/dge slong skye bo gzhan dag 'o ma dang shas pho mtshan rgyags par byed cing /_sbyar bar byed pa'i kha zas rnams yongs su spong ngo zhes rnam par
[\[258b.2\]]rtog na lus ma bsgoms pa rnams la yang sran ma sha dang /_til dang /_'bru mar dang /_nas rjen gyi phye la sogs pas pho mtshan cher rgyags par byed do/_/de de ltar na btsog pa dang /_gtsang ba rnam par rtog pa ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs snyems pa yin pas rab tu 'byung ba
[\[258b.3\]]rnams kyis yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/til dang /_la tu dang /_tshod ma dang /_'bru ba dang /_'bru rgod zas ni bdag tu chags pa zlog par byed pa yang ma yin pa zhi bar byed pa yang ma yin pas chos bsam pa can rnams btsog pa dang /_gtsang ba rnam par rtog pa 'di ni tshul
[\[258b.4\]]khrims dang brtul zhugs snyems pa'o/_/de dag gi so so'i gtso bo ni 'byung ba'i mthar phyin pa la sogs par klog go/_/bskyed pa'i sangs rgyas su ni rnam par gzigs/_/spyi tor can/_thams cad skyob/_log par dad sel la sogs pa de dag bskyed pa'i sangs rgyas su
[\[258b.5\]]rjes su dpag go/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa de lta bu dag la drang srong kha cig bzhugs nas de
[\[258b.6\]]dag la byed pa dang /_phrogs pa la sogs pa'i rnam par brtag go/_/k+Sha pa na ka dang /_dbyu gu can la sogs pas sbrang rtsi dang /_sha ni rang bzhin gyis sdig pa'i rgyu'o zhes rtog par byed na/_de dag gi kha zas gzhan 'bras chan dang /_sran ma sngon po la sogs pa cis ni sdig pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur
[\[258b.7\]]te/_/de bas na srog bcad pa yongs su spangs shing kha zas thams cad la ro'i sred pa yongs su spang ngo /_/ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las/_mkhas pa blo can mdzangs rnams kyis/_/zas gtsang bzang po cung zad bza'/_/rnal 'byor 'grub pa brkam med bza'/_/spangs pa'i zas su
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]der mi 'gyur/_/zhes pa ste/_des na 'o ma dang sha la sogs pa spangs pa 'ba' zhig las thar par 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi/_yul thams cad yongs su spang na thar par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan dag ni sha za ba la nyes pa med de/_chang la med cing 'khrig la'ang med/_/de ni
[\[259a.2\]]'byung po'i 'jug pa ste/_/bzlog pa 'bras bu che ba'o/_/zhes pa ni bzlog pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las thar ba ni 'bras bu che bar yang rung ngo /_/'jug pa ni bdag tu chags pa las te/_sha la sogs pa'i yul du sred pas 'khrul pa rnams la 'khor bar sdug bsngal 'brel par
[\[259a.3\]]'gyur ba ni phye ma leb mar me la sogs par lhung ba bzhin no/_/der tshad ma ni gang dang gang 'khor bar sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'brel par 'jug pa de dang de ni bdag tu chags shing bslad pa thog mar byas pa las 'byung ste/_me la phye ma leb la sogs pa bzhin no/_/'khor bar yang skye
[\[259a.4\]]ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid blang ba dang /_'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid du 'jug pa ni sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'brel pa zhes bya'o/_/de'i phyir bdag tu chags pa dang /_ser sna dang /_gzhan la gnod pa la sogs
[\[259a.5\]]pa ni sred pa la rjes su dpag go/_/gal te log pa'i shes pa'i bya ba ma gtogs par sdug bsngal rjes su 'bral bar 'gyur na ni de'i tshe dben pa'i ye shes skyes su zin yang ngam grog la sogs pa yul spong bzhin de nyid du ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnod pa'i
[\[259a.6\]]tshad ma'o/_/gzhan dag gis 'bru la sogs pa la srog tu kun brtags pa'i slong ba la sbyin pa yang sdig par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir bdag tu chags pa'i log pa'i shes pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ngo /_/bdag med pa shes pas 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor ba'i sdug
[\[259a.7\]]bsngal bzlog go/_/der btsog pa dang /_gtsang ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_mi za ba la sogs pa mi dgos so/_/cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_rgyan la sogs pa dang /_thal bas bskus pa dang /_dri ma 'chang ba dang /_ba glang dang /_ri dgas kyi brtul zhugs dang /_khrus dang /_zan mi za ba la
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]sogs pa sbyin sreg la sogs pa yang rung ste/_gang gis 'dod chags las skyo ba thar par 'gyur ba bdag tu sred pa las mi ldog pa'i phyir ro/_/zhi ba pa rnams/_gser la sogs pa rku ba dang /_/ba lang sha yang za ba dang /_/bram ze stong yang bsad pas kyang /_/yang dag rig na mi
[\[259b.2\]]gos so/_/yod pa rnams ni byas pa dang /_/rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten bsad/_/chang 'thung la sogs nyes pa yis/_/yang dag rig pa la mi gos/_/zhes so/_/tshangs spyod pa la sogs pa yis/_/ci phyir lus ni ltung bar byed/_/yang dag shes las de dag grol/_/de dag la ni gzir
[\[259b.3\]]gyur med/_/ces zer ro/_/de ste mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_mi gtsang ba dang /_stong pa bsgom pas 'dod chags kyis skyo ba la gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor du gyur na ni de'i tshe bdag tu chags pa dang /_ser sna dang /_gzhan la gnod pa'i dngos po med pas ji ltar na
[\[259b.4\]]rku ba dang /_chang dang /_gzhan gyi bud med la smrel bar 'gyur/_srog gcod pa'i sdig pa yang ji ltar na byed/_'dod chags kyi skyo ba tshangs par spyod pa yang ji ltar na yang gdung bar byed/_'on te de kho na nyid yi ge 'bru de brjod pas na ni der zhugs pas na ci'i phyir na 'dod chags dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_
[\[259b.5\]]bdag tu chags pa las ni 'khor bar sdug bsngal 'byung na chags pa dang ma bral gyi bar du ji ltar na 'grol/_de'i phyir chos dang gang zag la bdag med pa yongs su shes nas mthar zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas blo ni de lta bu'o/_/mtha' gsum yongs
[\[259b.6\]]su dag pa'i sha ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ngo zhes pa ni gang gnang ba yang med la bkag pa yang med de/_ji ltar zhe na/_mtha' gsum yongs su dag pa'i sha dkon par gsungs so/_/snying rje can gyi byang chub sems dpa' la ni de yang mdo sde 'dir bkag pa ste/_sngags
[\[259b.7\]]smra ba rnams la ni sha za rnams kyis bar chad byed cing gnod pa byed pas na khyad par du bkag go/_/rlung la sogs pa'i nad la ni ba mar dang /_'bru mar dang /_til dang /_til mar dang /_gro la sogs par gyur pa ni gnyen po'o/_/des na btsog pa dang gtsang ba'i sha snying rje can
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]gyis mi bza'o/_/'phags pa'i nyan thos rnams yang dag par lta ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_mi mdzes pa la sogs pa bsgom pa'i lam gyi rnam pa thams cad shes pa las gnas pa rnams ji ltar na sha la sogs pa'i
[\[260a.2\]]ro la mngon par chags par 'gyur/_btsun gtso byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhugs pa dar las g.yogs pa lta bur shes par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag snang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sgrib pa med par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te/_
[\[260a.3\]]de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/_de'i dngos po bas na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni chos nyid do/_/snang ba dang bcas pa dang /_snang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa rnams kyis shes bya'i sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_las kyi
[\[260a.4\]]sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir de dag la bkres pa ga la zhig ste/_'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa la gnas pa rnams lta bur ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du 'tsho ba'i dbang po dus thams cad du gnas so/_/mchog tu yongs su dag pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba thams
[\[260a.5\]]cad mkhyen cing gzugs sna tshogs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang po ting nge 'dzin gyi ro bdud rtsis 'tsho ba de dag la rnying pa mi mdzes pa'i sha la sogs pa'i ro myang bar ga las na 'gyur/_sems can thams cad rgyud rangs par mdzad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[260a.6\]]snying por thabs sna tshogs can byang chub sems kyi sems rgyu spangs pa rtag pa dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gnyis su med pa'i chos thabs sna tshogs kyis ston pa dang /_don dam pa dngos po dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu yon tan gyi
[\[260a.7\]]tshogs dang /_sa dang pha rol du phyin pa las rgyu dang 'bras bur byung ba dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa yon tan mang du 'byung ba dang /_sems kyi tshogs khyad par can dang dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung la mnga' ba la sogs
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]pa'i yon tan can dang /_cho 'phrul rgya che ba dang /_ye shes dpal bzang pos chud pa'i mun pa chen po mtha' dag bcom ste/_rab tu snang bar byas pa dang /_rab rib dang ling tog bcom ste nyi ma'i yon tan gyis 'jig rten mtha' dag snang bar mdzad pa'i thams cad
[\[260b.2\]]mkhyen pa rnams te/_mchog tu yongs su dag cing /_'dod chags dang bral ba thams cad mkhyen cing rnal 'byor gyi dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag de ltar sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal yongs su skyob par zhugs pa'o/_/mchod
[\[260b.3\]]sbyin pa kha cig ni rang byung rang nyid kyis mchod sbyin gyi don du lugs byas so zhes rtog pa de 'dir dpyad par bya ste/_gal te de 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig na ni rtsed mo'i phyir bya ste/_gzhan la sdug bsngal bar byed pa de la ci mkho/_/'on te 'dod chags dang bral ba
[\[260b.4\]]nyid yin na ni nang gi 'dod pas bslad de rnam pa mang por sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de'i mi shes pa yang sus byas/_des na ci yang sus kyang mi byed de/_gser gyi 'byung gnas bzhin du sems can rnams kyi chud pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o/_/ji lta
[\[260b.5\]]bur zhe na ni bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyun gyi dbang dang /_mnyam par mi 'jog pa'i ma rig pa ni gnyis kyi rnam pa glo bur du byung ba'i dri ma dang bral na dag pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa dag pa de dag ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal yongs su skyob cing mi 'jigs
[\[260b.6\]]pa sbyin par thams cad du zhugs pa'o/_/de dag gis bstan pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis ro'i sred pa thams cad yongs su spong na sems can la gnod par 'gyur ba'i sha za ba'i ro la chags par 'gyur ba lta zhig ci smos/_kha zas ni sman bzhin du bza'i
[\[260b.7\]]rgyags shing rlom pa'i phyir na ma yin te/_mkhas pa rnams la gang ni sdig pa med pa rnams de lta bu ni lus gso ba 'ba' zhig gi phyir rung ngo /_/nan tan can rnams la ni bye brag tu ste/_slong ba'i zas su gang ltung zhing khyim bdag gis byin pa ni 'bras chan bzhin du de

[\[261a.1\]]dag gi zas gtso yin te/_ci 'dis dbang po bzhin du gzhan la gnod par byas te zas rnyed dam/_'on te ci bdag nyid kyis ji lta bu zhig tu 'byung ngam zhes rnam par mi brtag par blangs la nan tan pa rnams 'byung ste 'gro'o/_/brgyud pa las sdig par 'gyur du
[\[261a.2\]]zin na ni 'gron pa la yang sdig par 'gyur te/_gal te 'gron po lam du mi 'gro na ni mi rgod la ma byin par blang bar ji ltar na 'gyur/_gal te ma bskyed na ni ji ltar na gsod par 'gyur/_des na pha ma la yang sdig par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na bsam pa yongs su dag pas gzhan
[\[261a.3\]]la phan par zhugs te/_slong ba bslangs na thams cad du bsod nams yod de/_gnyis kyi rnam par bsod nams so/_/de de ltar thams cad mkhyen pas gzhan la gnod pa la ltos te sha za ba dang sha za bar bskul pa la ni sdig par gsungs so/_/mtha' gsum bkag
[\[261a.4\]]par gyur pa las sdig pa mi bya ste/_mtha' gsum yongs su dag pa ni bdag gis ma bsad/_gsod du ma bcug_/ltos pa yang med pa ste/_rnam pa de ltar 'bras chan lta bur slong ba'i zas ma bslangs pa ma bsams par byin pa ni yongs su dag pa ste/_sman lta
[\[261a.5\]]bur shis pa'i zas so/_/snying rje can gyi byang chub sems dpa' la de yang bkag pa'o/_/sngags mkhan la ni khyad par du ste/_sems can mgu bar bya ba dang /_lha mngon par dang bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir yul thams cad kyi ro myang bar chags pa yongs su
[\[261a.6\]]spangs na mthar ro/_/sangs rgyas byang chub skye bo la/_/gdon za med par bdar ba yin/_/gser bzhin du ni bzhag pa ste/_/mngon sum rjes su dpag pa yi/_/gnyis su 'gro ba'i yul gyis su/_/shes rab kyis ni gnyis med 'grub/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi blo rgyas
[\[261a.7\]]pas/_/rtsod pa du mar rab phye ste/_/yang dag chos ni bshad pa ni/_/bdag dang gzhan la phan pa yi/_/ye shes dpal bzang bya bas ni/_/lang kar gshegs par shes par bya'o/_/shes rab gang ni pha rol phyin/_/rab tu rnam par rgyas pa'i yul/_/gnyis kyi tshul gyis rab

[\[261b.1\]]rgyas pa/_/gnyis med rigs par zhugs pa de/_/lang kar gsungs dang dgongs tshul gyis/_/bshad pa sbyar bar bya ba ni/_/phung por gnas pa rnam par 'jig_/mgo yung rab rib mtshungs par nod/_/de ni zhi ba rab zhi ste/_/sbom po phyogs kyi chas stong pa/_/nam mkha' me tog bzhin

[\[261b.5\]]de ltar ni/_/snying rje dang ni shes rab kyang /_/rab tu yangs pas gzhan la phan/_/'dir ni bdag gis gang bshad pa/_/rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi gtsug lag dang /_/tshig tshul tshangs pa smra la sogs/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi blo rgyas pa'i/_/grub mtha'i khyad
[\[261b.6\]]par ma bshad do/_/'dir bshad pa yi chos rnams dbang /_/gzhan du bshad pa med pa ste/_/rgyal po la yang brten pa med/_/ye shes dpal ni bzang po zhes/_/bya bas 'dus pa brgyad pa las/_/ston pa'i don ni byas pa'o/_/gang sngon 'phags pa klus

[\[262a.1\]]nas su/_/gdon za med pa 'di ni tshul can sbyar/_/skye bo bsod nams nga yis kun mkhyen shog_/log pa'i rtog pa chud bya bar/_/smon log nga yis ci dgos te/_/dam chos gang ni gdon mi za/_/'di byas nub pa'i dus la'o/_/dam pa'i chos ston mdzad pa 'di'i/_/brtse

[\[262a.3\]]dpal bzang dge slong gis/_/dam chos nges par bshad pa'i phyir/_/de ltar sgrib pa zad par 'gyur/_/rab rib skyes pa bdag la ni/_/bri ba gsol ba btab dag la/_/byang chub bla med de thob ste/_/thog ma nyid du de rtogs bya/_/zhes pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs
[\[262a.4\]]pa dam pa'i chos thams cad kyi 'grel pa lang kar gshegs pa'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi bsdu ba'i tshigs bcad ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i 'grel pa las don dam yang dag 'phags kyis yongs su gsol ba'i 'og tu bshad pa 'dir sbyar bar bya'o/_/sha'i dpyad pa'i
[\[262a.5\]]gong du'am 'og tu 'brel te/_blo gros chen pos tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab ste/_bcom ldan 'das la yang gsol pa zhes gang gis de ltar klog pas na snga ma'i le'u der rtogs par brtag go/_/de la mtshon nas brjod pa'i gnas mang zhing de bzhin
[\[262a.6\]]gshegs par lung ston pa la sogs pa bsdu ba'i tshigs bcad nyid las 'byung ngo /_/gang de dag gis chos bshad phyir/_/ji zhig las kyang yul 'khrul te/_/sems kyis sdig pa skyes gyur pa/_/mchod sbyin du mas zhi gnas gyur/_/sdug bsngal mi mdzes tshogs dang rmi
[\[262a.7\]]bzhin du/_/stong par 'jig rten rnam par shes nas ni/_/ye shes dpal bzang pos ni rnal 'byor du/_/'jig rten thams cad shes rab snying rjer gyur/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ye shes dpal bzang pos sbyar ba rdzogs so//_//
